subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hello there everyone

full_text:

Hi everyone,

 

I am new to this group also. I have been experimenting wi=
th ITC for about 6 months now, with fairly good results from a basic radio =
shack hack. I am hoping to learn more about the set up of other devices and=
 maybe gain some more technical knowledge from this group. 

-----Original =
Message-----
From: "Misty Dawn" <bulletbabea@...>
Sent: Monday, Novem=
ber 17, 2008 3:32pm
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hell=
o there everyone

Hi Marie. Welcome to the group. I enjoy manual sweep tuni=
ng and have had some great results including direct responses using that me=
thod. I think when they use my name (first middle and last) constantly that=
 kind of throws out the randomness idea most skeptics have. But usually it =
takes people hearing thier own names and info to wonder if there is more to=
 it.

Misty


--- On Mon, 11/17/08, marie32711 wrote:

> From: marie32711 
=
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Hello there everyone
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> D=
ate: Monday, November 17, 2008, 12:56 PM
> Hi i am really interested in evp=
/itc and have been recording
> for 
> aproximately 5/6 months i currently d=
o both normal evp work
> and also 
> radio scanning(not franks box or radio=
 shack hacks) but
> manually 
> scanning through the channels..i have been =
quite surprised
> by the 
> results that i have got.
> I have video posted =
on youtube(screen name mazblondie) and
> it would be 
> excellent if anyone=
 could give there opinions.
> I have had many different theory presented to=
 me, from
> imaginationto 
> plain faking it, but i can believe that it is =
all down to
> chance!!
> Hope to hear from you soon.
> Marie
